The Abdicated prince, or, The adventures of four years a tragi-comedy, as it was lately acted at the court at Alba Regalis by several persons of great quality.
The second edition.
[4], 60 p.
Printed for John Carterson, London : 1690.
A political satire relating to James II and the Duke of Monmouth. Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
